Document: # Space Law: Restricted Weapons - [color=#cb0000]\[Security\][/color] Lethal firearms, excluding syndicate firearms, proto kinetic accelerators, glaives, daggers, crushers and the antique laser gun - [color=#cb0000]\[Security/Salvage\][/color] Proto kinetic accelerators, glaives, daggers, and crushers - [color=#cb0000]\[Security/Command\][/color] Antique laser gun - [color=#cb0000]\[None\][/color] Syndicate weapons - [color=#cb0000]\[None\][/color] Swords - [color=#cb0000]\[None\][/color] Improvised weaponry, including baseball bats - [color=#cb0000]\[None\][/color] Lethal implants - [color=#cb0000]\[None\][/color] Other lethal weapons
